TITLE: Group Review And Feedback
DEF: Feedback developed in discourse by a group that does not contribute to grading
TASK: The Group Review and Feedback pattern enables students to engage in collective assessment and reflection on group projects or tasks. This pattern not only encourages teamwork, communication, and problem-solving skills, but also offers opportunities for continuous learning and improvement through peer insights. By cultivating a sense of collective responsibility, it fosters a supportive learning community.
